"Gunslash Boot Camp I":
"Greetings. I'm Joseph, retired ARKS training officer,
at your service. It seems the top brass thinks you
show promise, so I've been called back temporarily
to make a master gunslash user out of you. The
gunslash is a versatile weapon that is effective
in all manner of situations, whether you're in
close-range or long-range combat. Let's start by
having you show me how you use the weapon.
Your mission? Go face the Galph.
*Gunslashes only"

"ごきげんよう。退役教導官のジョーゼフだ。
有望な君を一人前のガンスラッシュ使いに
育て上げるよう、上から言われて来た。
ガンスラッシュは、近接戦でも遠距離戦でも
あらゆる局面への対処が可能な武器だ。
まずは君の戦いぶりを見せてもらいたい。
今すぐガルフを倒しに出かけたまえ！

※銃剣系限定"
